name: Monke - And the spirit banana
description:
Game made for the LiNK CMGT - Game jam

Backstory:

Pirates stole your bananas and your mighty "spirit banana". Now you need to rescue them. Find your "spirit banana" and use its power to slow down time and find the other bananas.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

Space - Jump

Jump at vines and press E - Grab vines

(While E:) While you grab vines:

W - To climb

(Depends on the side you grab the vines) A/D - To turn around

(While turn around) While you are grabbed on vines and are turned around

Space - Wall jump

Power-button:

Press Enter to Slow down time
